00059 
00060     if ( 0 == _instance ) {
00061

00064

00089 void Document::setTempo(const double tempo) {
00090 
00091     if ( (TEMPO_MIN <= tempo && tempo <= TEMPO_MAX ) ) {
00092 
00093         _tempo = tempo;
00094         updateDelays();
00095     }
00096 
00097     notifyObservers();
00098 }

00108 void Document::initDelays(void) {
00109 
00110     for (int i = 0; i < DELAYS_COUNT; i++) {
00111 
00112         _delays.push_back(new Delay());
00113     }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void Document::destroyDelays(void) {
00117 
00118     for ( int i = 0; i < DELAYS_COUNT; i++ ) {
00119 
00120         delete _delays[i];
00121         _delays[i] = 0;
00122     }
00123 
00124     _delays.clear();
00125 
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 void Document::updateDelays(void) {
00130 
00131     DelayCalculator::getInstance()->process();
00132 }
